entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
